lead_paragraph: In this radically reimagined American Western set towards the end of the Civil War, Southerner Augusta (Brit Marling, Arbitrage, The East) encounters two renegade, drunken soldiers (Sam Worthington, Avatar&Kyle Soller, BBC’s “Poldark”) who are on
